resources.string:
Press the "Input Settings" button, enable CryptBoard, accept any prompts, and press your device's back button. CryptBoard does not log any keystrokes and does not transmit any information 

Press the "Keyboard Selection" button and select CryptBoard from the list to make it your default keyboard. 

You can switch back to another keyboard at any time by using the keyboard icon on the navigation bar on the bottom of your device screen whenever they keyboard is displayed

Press the \"Input Settings\" button, enable CryptBoard, accept any prompts, and press your device\'s back button. CryptBoard does not log any keystrokes and does not transmit any information \n\nPress the \"Keyboard Selection\" button and select CryptBoard from the list to make it your default keyboard
QR generated based on public key
